list.sql: select :select from address_element a join address_element_level l on l.id = a.level_id join address_element_type t on t.id = a.type_id where :filters order by a.parent_id DESC

count.sql: select count(*) from address_element a join address_element_level l on l.id = a.level_id join address_element_type t on t.id = a.type_id where :filters

field.select: (select true from address_element where a.id = parent_id limit 1) as hasChildren

filters.eq: (select true from address_element where a.id = parent_id limit 1) = :hasChildren
